text: Splitting Heirs is a 1993 British American black comedy movie directed by Robert Young and starring John Cleese, Eric Idle, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rick Moranis, Barbara Hershey, Sadie Frost, Susie Silvey, Eric Sykes and Stratford Johns. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1993 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about murder Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Movies directed by Robert Young
title: Splitting Heirs
